chapter.title: Documentation
chapter.para: Each Eiffel library or tool should come with some documentation to be placed in $GOBO/doc/[library-or-tool-name]. Documentation should be written in American English. It is possible to provide the documentation in other languages (French, Spanish, Dutch, German, ...), but it should at least be available in American English.
The format of the documentation is XML using the DocBook schema. There is a free book, DocBook: The Definitive Guide, that explains DocBook very clearly.
